title: Reportable for building Trinity Force on Hecarim???

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
First off, screw auto-fill.

Because of auto-fill I was placed in my worst role ever: Jungle. I ask my team if I can lane swap but no luck. My team asks for a tanky jungler so I pick Hecarim because he's pretty busted. We lost that game because they had a fed Yasuo and I was flamed for many reasons alongside a Top Singed. One of the main reasons I was flamed was because I was building Trinity Force on Hecarim, my teammates accused me of trolling for building it because I was negative with a KDA of 5/7/6. I would understand if they flamed me because I was negative but that didn't even matter to them. They were so upset of me for building the item over my overall performance. This wasn't just one person, it was everyone except the Singed accusing me of trolling. Other reasons they flamed me was because I banned Poppy over Yasuo and I couldn't 'jungle' (no shit, Sherlocks). Can someone tell me if building Trinity Force is bannable because I was negative?
